name: Forpix
description:
Forpix is a 2d  pixel style survival game.

  • Get resource by cutting trees and rocks!
  • Build campfire to keep your warm!
  • Build weapon to protect yourself from the skeletons!

CONTROLS

  • Press and hold to destroy objects.
  • Press right mouse button to eat food.
  • Click on to get the items.
  • I:Inventory
  • C:Crafting
  • O:Increase window size
  • P:Decrease window size
